fields.original_string:
private static final Pattern DEFINITION_PATTERN = Pattern.compile(
    WSP_REGEX + "\\(" +
      WSP_REGEX + "(" + NO_WSP_REGEX + ")" +
      WSP_REGEX + "(?:NAME (?:'([^']+)'|\\(([^\\)]+)\\)))?" +
      WSP_REGEX + "(?:DESC '([^']*)')?" +
      WSP_REGEX + "(OBSOLETE)?" +
      WSP_REGEX + "(?:SYNTAX (" + NO_WSP_REGEX + "))?" +
      WSP_REGEX + "(?:(X-[^ ]+.*))?" +
      WSP_REGEX + "\\)" + WSP_REGEX);

DEFINITION_PATTERN = Pattern.compile(
    WSP_REGEX + "\\(" +
      WSP_REGEX + "(" + NO_WSP_REGEX + ")" +

      WSP_REGEX + "(?:SYNTAX (" + NO_WSP_REGEX + "))?" +
      WSP_REGEX + "(?:(X-[^ ]+.*))?" +
      WSP_REGEX + "\\)" + WSP_REGEX)
